body_content.explanation: an amount of money that is given regularly to everyone or to every adult in a society by a government or other organization and that is the same for everyone:
examples: In 1985, a government commission recommended a universal basic income but the idea was dismissed as unworkable.
At what level would universal basic income be set?
Countries with universal basic incomes have been very successful in reducing poverty.
A Universal Basic Income will make sure that nobody is overcome by extreme poverty.
